result.arabic_text: أَنِ ٱقۡذِفِيهِ فِي ٱلتَّابُوتِ فَٱقۡذِفِيهِ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّ فَلۡيُلۡقِهِ ٱلۡيَمُّ بِٱلسَّاحِلِ يَأۡخُذۡهُ عَدُوّٞ لِّي وَعَدُوّٞ لَّهُۥۚ وَأَلۡقَيۡتُ عَلَيۡكَ مَحَبَّةٗ مِّنِّي وَلِتُصۡنَعَ عَلَىٰ عَيۡنِيٓ
result.translation: 39. Woh Ku-inak: ku-baxi Muusa yaabukeek gamadal sandugut kaa hayisaay, niil weeqaytut kaa ruubaay, tokkel Niil weeqayti isik qaxal kaa ayyaaqe-le, tokkel yok qaduwwiiy kaak qaduwwih yan num kaa beele iyyaanamah maysaxxaageh tet niysixxige, kaadu Muusaw yok yan kacanu koi qide koo ablinnaanih mari koo yakcineeh yi-dacayrih gubat qartaah tanbcmkch iyye Yalli.
